modName: Blanc and Noir - Guard Number 1s Custom Followers
summary: This mod adds little twins followers that are vampire.
descriptionHtml:
Blanc and Noir - Guard Number 1's Custom Followers

Description
This mod adds little twins followers that are vampire.

Specification
Their names are Blanc and Noir.
You can find them the second floor of the guard barracks in Whiterun.
Status is the same as the high elves.
Body mesh is UNP by default.
Texture uses original from Fair Skin and Pretty Face.
Please do not change the skeleton , such as height , so would change.
Location ... DatameshesActorscharacterNoir_guard1 of mesh
Location ... DatatexturesactorscharacterNoir_guard1 texture

Those necessary for the operation
Skyrim 1.9.32+
RaceCompatibility.esm

Recommend
SIZE DOES MATTER - NPCs do not rescale shrink resize

Installation
The Data folder Noir_guard1.esp
Please put it in the same location as the folder name the rest of the files.

Uninstallation
Please delete the file that you added during installation.

How to use
You can follower If you call out .

Credit

Permission

Change log
July 4, 2014 Release 1.0

------------------------------
Gamwich, thank you for many advice and production of the texture. Thank you again.
